modules.name: Bitwise
modules.description: Bookshelf bitwise operations module, offering tools for precise binary data manipulation in datapacks.

modules.name: Block
modules.description: Bookshelf block management module, enabling id and state transformations.

modules.name: Color
modules.description: Bookshelf color module, facilitating seamless conversion between various color formats.

modules.name: Dump
modules.description: Bookshelf debugging tool that outputs variable contents directly to chat.

modules.name: Environment
modules.description: Bookshelf module providing comprehensive access to weather and biome properties.

modules.name: Generation
modules.description: Bookshelf world manipulation module, useful for iterating over blocks and creating structures or landscapes.

modules.name: Health
modules.description: Bookshelf health module for efficiently healing and damaging entities.

modules.name: Hitbox
modules.description: Bookshelf module for retrieving and checking the hitboxes of blocks and entities.

modules.name: ID
modules.description: Bookshelf module for assigning and managing entity IDs.

modules.name: Interaction
modules.description: Bookshelf module for building GUI systems using Interaction entities and event binding.

modules.name: Link
modules.description: Bookshelf entity linking system, enabling synchronized movement and structured relationships.

modules.name: Log
modules.description: Bookshelf logging utility for structured messages in chat with severity levels.

modules.name: Math
modules.description: Bookshelf mathematical toolkit, bringing advanced calculations to Minecraft.

modules.name: Move
modules.description: Bookshelf module providing precise control over entity movement.

modules.name: Position
modules.description: Bookshelf position management system, allowing control over entity locations and rotations using scores.

modules.name: Random
modules.description: Bookshelf module featuring a variety of random number generation functions.

modules.name: Raycast
modules.description: Bookshelf raycasting module for casting rays that react to block and entity collisions.

modules.name: Schedule
modules.description: Bookshelf command scheduler, including cancellation and execution context tracking.

modules.name: Sidebar
modules.description: Bookshelf utility for creating dynamic and visually appealing scoreboard-based sidebars.

modules.name: Spline
modules.description: Manipulate smooth curves created from control points.

modules.name: Time
modules.description: Bookshelf system time module, retrieving real-time information in Minecraft.

modules.name: Tree
modules.description: Bookshelf collection of ready-to-use trees for natural-looking landscapes.

modules.name: Vector
modules.description: Bookshelf vector math toolkit for manipulating and performing operations on vectors.

modules.name: View
modules.description: Bookshelf set of easy-to-use commands that execute based on what an entity sees.

modules.name: XP
modules.description: Bookshelf experience management system for handling player XP and levels efficientl
